metadata.dc:author: Mellado Polio, A
metadata.dc:description: Some aspects of the streptococcus genera and its relationship with the human streptococcal disease are reviewed. Special reference is made to the relationship of the human disease and the different species and most frequent serotypes.
metadata.dc:title: Aspectos microbiol√≥gicos de las estreptococias.
[Microbiological aspects of streptococcal disease (author's transl)].
